member.name: LSA_FOREST_TRUST_DOMAIN_INFO
member.summary: The LSA_FOREST_TRUST_DOMAIN_INFO structure contains identifying information for a domain.

member.name: LSA_FOREST_TRUST_DOMAIN_INFO.Sid
member.summary: Pointer to the security identifier of the domain.

member.name: LSA_FOREST_TRUST_DOMAIN_INFO.DnsName
member.summary: structure that contains the DNS name of the domain.

member.name: LSA_FOREST_TRUST_DOMAIN_INFO.NetbiosName
member.summary: structure that contains the NetBIOS name of the domain.
